title: Gifted Legendary Skin to Friend, I didn't recieve Mystery Skin
body:
Hello Riot,

I gifted my friend a Legendary Skin.  He received it just fine, but on the site is says if I gift a legendary I get a free mystery Skin.  I haven't received one.  Is this a known bug, or is there something more I need to do to receive the free skin?

Thanks,
DrFantabulous

replies.body:
Heya - 

As Terrible Tornado mentioned, if you gift someone a legendary/ultimate skin, the person on the receiving end is **also** going to receive the mystery gift.
It says if you buy or **are gifted** a legendary/ultimate skin. Since your friend got a legendary skin, he got a mystery skin.
